DPTECHNICS
YOUR ELECTRONICS RESOURCE
ART calibration update

To install ART calibration data into the DPT-Board you must follow these steps

  1. Select the ART data you want to install into the DPT-Board
  2. Press the Update ART data button and wait for your device to boot again.
WARNINGS
  • The ART data is unique for each DPT-Board and is factory installed, please do not update to other ART as it may cause bad or no WiFi operation.
  • Do not power off the device during update, this may break your device.
  • The DPT-Board will restart after the installation is finished.
  • Make sure to upload the correct bootloader, a wrong file may break your device.
Update firmware Update bootloader
